thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: Stacey Cervellino

author: Stacey Cervellino
title: Stacey Cervellino
text:
The site was easy to use, the choices beautiful, and it's saved us so much money on invitations. Plus you can print as many invitations as you want, to mail to family or friends who don't use email, or to keep as a memento.
The company is helpful and friendly and there aren't millions of emails trying to upsell you, etc...Just updates on your rsvp list. I love that guests will receive reminders, links to directions, information on the wedding, and our registry. The registry site they work with allows you to add items from any retailer, start a honeymoon fund or home improvement fund or a charity of your choice. It's made things 100 % easier.
Everyone has complimented us on the invite design. We highly recommend Greenvelope!
